title: The Last King
description: This 5 chapter short is the second episode of a fourteen-part serial novel......Emmy comes face to face with a tall, handsome stranger who, little does she know, is about to change her entire world.SHORT BOOK SYNOPSISAn immortal man who hails from a line of people who ate from the Tree of Life in the Garden of Eden, must kill off the human threat sent to him by God, a woman whose job it is to take back his "stolen property" of immorality and dispose of him. When Dr. Gilead Knightly finally meets his fated match in Emmy Hughes, he must choose between his knowledge that he must take her life in order to survive, and his growing feelings of love for her.
author: A. Yamina Collins
